short_description: This spicy pineapple margarita brings some jalapeno heat and chili-lime seasoning to your tropical margarita! Use as little or as much as you like.

short_description: A fruit tray is a large platter that showcases assorted prepared fresh fruit. This is mostly served at large get-togethers, including weddings, holidays, or BBQs.
This easy brownie recipe takes about 30 minutes to make from start to finish for a chocolaty treat!

Oatmeal is full of positives. It is loaded with fiber and minerals and is a healthy carbohydrate…keeping you full and satisfied longer.  Oatmeal is also known to reduce inflammation and lower cholesterol levels.
This Mexican fruit cup recipe features fresh fruits drizzled with Tajin chile lime seasoning for an added citrus and mildly spicy flavors.

Pineapple Orange Sunshine Juice is a refreshing and absolutely delicious blend of pineapple, orange, cucumber, ginger, and lemon juice. It’s a delicious way to enjoy nourishing ingredients, with light sweetness and big flavors.

This Grapefruit Orange Lemon Juice. Not everyone associates citrus with winter, but I do. I can’t get enough of this juice and I make a variation of it every day. It’s refreshing, vibrant and oh so delicious!

short_description: These sweet potato fries will change your life. I’m serious! They are salty-sweet, crunchy, and spicy if you wish. Baked sweet potato fries have been one of my favorite snacks since I first shared the recipe eight years ago.

short_description: I love this kale Caesar salad made with lovely dark green kale leaves and a homemade Caesar salad dressing that's easy to make in minutes in a blender. Sprinkle croutons and shaved Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese on top, and it's ready to serve!

meal_ingredients: 2 medium mangos - peeled, seeded and diced
